author: scottbw
msg: Merging in the Pluggable Persistence branch into the Wookie trunk. This replaces the Hibernate persistence mechanism with a new pluggable framework developed by Randy Watler (thanks Randy!) that has implementations using JPA and JCR, with the possibility of adding other persistence options in the future.

author: hibou
msg: * add configuration conversion for backward compatibility
* remove the retrieve from classpath container config
